name: PLK_Partychange
description:
Switch actor positions during battle.

Plugin command

PLK_Partychange open

Open the character switch window from the command.

Terms of Use Free to use in both commercial and non-commercial projects as long as credit is given. Simply credit "Paltkorn" in your in-game credits. You

To distribute, please point it here. Thank you for your support

Please do not change the plugin name.

v1.2 Added a new window management style to make it look better.

v1.1  Fix a few bugs

v1.0  activated
